title: Clockwork Hearts (Steampunk Syndicate, #1).
description: In a Steampunk future, the Clockwork Heart has saved the lives of many from a grim existence of heart disease. Everyone owes their freedom to the device's creator - SHINSEI - the most powerful man and inventor of their world. Arthur Elmstone's lifelong dream comes true when he is recruited into the prestigious Inventor Fellowship program, hosted by SHINSEI, along with 500 other young inventors. But as their world around them begins to crumble, Arthur is suddenly burdened with the responsibility of their future; along with betrayal, new discoveries, and unexpected romance.
author: Minnie R. Woodbury
